name: Dwarfs Domain
overview: Long ago there was a bloody battle between the Dwarfs and the Orcs. Although the dwarfs were victorious they lost their leader Krane who had fought with the legendary Golden Bow and Arrow 0f Condor, (a gift from the Gods). In the heat 0f the battle these weapons were stolen by an Orc and hidden in the dwarfs domain. Nobody knows where they are. Can you, the great adventurer, find these weapons and return them. This is an adventure that will keep you going lor a long time.
